person.persName: John Mason Marcus (Grant County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Grant County, Kentucky, farmer. Son of John W. Marcus and Susan Marcus. Married to Mary Ann Penell Marcus in Scott County, Kentucky on October 21, 1860. Father of Robert Marcus, Emeline Marcus, Martha Marcus, and Alice Marcus. Farmer in Grant County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 18th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from November 25, 1861 to June 22, 1865.
